file_content.text: No. No, I don't think so. Thank you.
The Skytroopers, they just came from nowhere. We'd done nothing!
We're no threat to the Spire, but the droids drove us from our homes and started burning everything!
Please! Stop them, like you did for us. There are others out there. Our families and friends. Our homes... there'll be nothing left.
We'll stop the droids. Gather anyone you find away from the fighting.
Arcann's going to pay. For all of this.
You're pushing our luck, Jorgan. This isn't why we're here.
I don't know your reason for coming here, but this is mine.
I'm going to help. You can either pitch in or try to find your way back to camp without me.
We'll rescue everyone we can. Meet us afterward and we'll see about getting you out of here.
